title: Ship Page :D
body:
Hey everyone so this is for all the people who ship champions in lol :D! any ship is welcome for example here is my ship.
{{champion:45}} {{champion:117}}  think about it the tiny master of evil with the fae sorceress :D. bubbly meets evil and what do you get?

replies.body: I like Gangplanks ship. Too bad it was blown up ;_;
{{champion:92}} X{{champion:154}}
http://orig11.deviantart.net/012b/f/2009/209/3/e/3ef9657d345cd17828da1a16db740aae.jpg

There is only one:

{{champion:131}} x {{champion:89}}
{{champion:223}} isn't a fish then?
Well, he is, but I'm pretty sure he's from like a spiritual river thing in an alternate dimension...

{{champion:201}} BMFF: Alex Louis Armstrong

http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140426014136/leagueoflegends/images/0/06/Braum_OriginalSkin.jpg

http://static.zerochan.net/Alex.Louis.Armstrong.full.212836.jpg

How could these two NOT be Best Muscular Friends Forever?!

{{champion:92}} x {{champion:102}} Problem with it? IDC!

{{champion:103}} x {{champion:37}} HAHA!

{{champion:55}} x {{champion:92}} Why not another one? 

{{champion:23}} x {{champion:22}} duh.

{{champion:81}} x {{champion:44}} Double Duh.
Lore-wise, Panth and Leona do have a thiiiiiiing.

Thank you everyone for adding stuff on to this page its cool to see all the different ideas :D. so im just gonna put down my top three people have put down 
3. {{champion:432}} x {{champion:203}}: FREAKING LOVE THIS ONE PERFECT :D the arrow of death and the wandering caretaker as a couple makes so much freaking sense
2. {{champion:61}} x {{champion:53}}: never seen it before and think it honestly is pretty great. imagine what interactions would be between these two in like a show of sorts :D
1. {{champion:267}} x {{champion:105}}: now with tahm in here (and yes he is a catfish they have said it before) I can imagine a confrontation between fizz and tahm over name and fizz winning(cause he be broken) and then him getting together with name It would be sweet as they are in charge of the underwater world then :D. I gotta make a fanfic outa that one thanks for bringing that up Coriandr.

Outside of that just another thank you and will try to make other pages like this soon :D

{{champion:432}} X {{champion:203}} 

Bard plays his chimes, while kindred hums.
{{champion:24}}  x {{champion:114}}? Rival romance? I mean people ship {{champion:107}} and {{champion:76}} so.

{{champion:45}} x {{champion:117}}  has been done so much. While still good it has become just another pairing. We should have some new and outragious pairings. Bend the rules a bit people.

{{champion:102}} x{{champion:102}} Shyvana secretly has a twin sister and doesn't meet her until after joining Demacia. You guys take it from there.
DRASONA #LAZULIKYUTESTLEAGUECOMICSEVA

I don't really get why everyone ships Leona with Diana, I see them more like sisters.
Although I kind of do ship Leona with Pantheon.

{{champion:45}} {{champion:117}} original fan story that started it: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3174110

Have at it and start a "{{champion:22}} &{{champion:23}} can know how Rivini's story would end but we can't?! RITO PLS!" meme...

ok so time to comment on these all ya know? :D
{{champion:131}}  x {{champion:89}}  yuri ftw!!!: I mean idk Leona braum tho but I see what you are saying.
{{champion:102}}  x {{champion:59}} it's otp for me~: love this one have shipped it before :D I mean lore doesn't lie does it?
{{champion:86}}  x{{champion:55}}: so obvious I cant even say it. not one to just forget about though
and finaly {{champion:92}} X{{champion:154}}: I have seen enough of these and I honestly kinda do like it. but imagine yasuo riven :D. I mean I know there is a possibility that she killed his master but I mean we don't know until then two highly mobile and broken swordsmen perfect pair am I right?

{{champion:131}}  x {{champion:89}}  yuri ftw!!!

{{champion:102}}  x {{champion:59}} it's otp for me~

and

{{champion:86}}  x{{champion:55}}
